usa: John Brown leads a raid on Harper's Ferry.
australia: SS Admella wrecked off south-east coast of South Australia with the loss of 89 lives.
Australian rules football codified, Melbourne Football Club founded
Queensland separated from New South Wales with its western border at 141° E.
argentina: Defeat of Unitarian forces led by Bartolomé Mitre by Urquiza and federals at Battle of Cepeda; Buenos Aires re-enters confederation
